about.title: Profile
about.p1: Full-stack software developer with a strong frontend focus, building production-ready web applications from scratch.
about.p2: Experienced in autonomous development, product-oriented thinking, and shipping real systems used in production. Background in engineering and industrial consulting, bringing rigor, documentation discipline, and reliability to software projects.

items: Designed and developed a full-stack <highlight>SaaS for automated lead capture</highlight> and processing
Frontend built with <highlight>Next.js (App Router), React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS</highlight>
Backend <highlight>REST APIs with Node.js/Express</highlight>, webhook validation, and third-party integrations (Make.com, Notion API)
Data persistence with <highlight>PostgreSQL</highlight> (Railway), structured schemas and migrations
Test coverage with <highlight>Jest</highlight> for unit and integration testing
Deployed and operated in production with <highlight>CI/CD pipelines</highlight> (GitHub Actions, Railway, Vercel)
Key focus: <highlight>autonomous development, product ownership, production delivery</highlight>

piping.company: Industrial Engineering Consulting · Capgemini · Bee Engineering · Abylsen
items: Client-facing consulting role on industrial and engineering projects
Worked with structured milestones, validation steps, and decision points
Produced <highlight>technical documentation</highlight>, standards-compliant deliverables, and proofs of concept
Collaborated with cross-functional teams under strict quality and production constraints
Developed <highlight>automation scripts (Python, Bash, VBA)</highlight> to optimize repetitive technical workflows
<highlight>Transferable skills</highlight>: rigor, documentation, stakeholder communication, structured problem-solving

cpge.title: CPGE PTSI – PT (Classes Préparatoires aux Grandes Écoles)
cpge.description: Intensive training in mathematics, physics, and engineering fundamentals

projects.title: Projets en production
projects.subtitle: Web applications designed, built and deployed in real-world conditions

saas.title: Lead Generation SaaS Platform
saas.description: Full-stack application with multi-step questionnaire, automated lead processing via webhooks and management dashboard. Email notification system and Notion synchronization.

management.title: Lead Management Dashboard
management.description: Internal dashboard with real-time data visualization, lead management, and Umami Analytics integration. Admin interface with access control.

api.title: Multi-source Lead Ingestion API
api.description: Node.js REST API centralizing leads from automation platforms (Make.com, Google Forms, Typeform). Intelligent data normalization, PostgreSQL storage, and automated Notion synchronization.

taskmanager.title: Django Task Manager
taskmanager.description: Full-stack task management application with user authentication, project organization, and task filtering. Responsive mobile-first UI with Docker containerization and production deployment.
